      • timeElapsed

        public static java.lang.String timeElapsed(long st,
                                           long et)
        Compute time elapsed from start time to end time.
        Parameters:
        st - start time in millis taken from System.currentTimeMillis() when job starts
        et - end time in millis taken from System.currentTimeMillis() when job ends
        Returns:
        time elapsed
